0.title: How to make your own DiscoX
0.content: The DiscoX is priced such that considering individual component postage and possible build mistakes it’s almost certainly cheaper to buy a DiscoX pre-built than to make your own. That said one of the core design features of the DiscoX is that it is relativley modular. Meaning as time goes on and they inevitibly break, they should be relativley cheap to repair.

5.title: Upgrading your DiscoX device software
5.content: The DiscoX software is open to continous improvment, to keep you device running smoothly and take advantage of new features it’s reccomended you keep up to date with the latest stable release.

10.content: These are the the instructions for the latest firmware release, you may be using an older version of the DiscoX software on your device. To update to the latest version follow these instructions.

14.title: The DiscoX
14.content: This website is currently a work in progress. It will provide the most upto date technical infomation about the DiscoX cave survey device. The DiscoX is a cave surveying device based on the SAP6 platform. The main differences being, the case design, user interface and microcontroller hardware.
